com.tictactoe.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tictactoe.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Represents a game of Tic Tac Toe. Contains players and a game board.

      • addPlayer

        public Game.PlayerLetter addPlayer(Player p)
        Adds a player to this game. Changes status of game from WAITING to IN_PROGRESS if the game fills up.
        Parameters:
        p -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if there are already 2 or more players assigned to this game.
